alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:50PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Portage, northern Trumbull, southern Geauga and southern Ashtabula Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlefield, or 12 miles southeast of Chardon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cortland, South Russell, Middlefield, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Andover, West Farmington, Bristolville, Aurora, Parkman, Mecca, Johnston, Hiram, Cherry Valley, Bainbridge and Orangeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
